hero.title: About Us
hero.description:
At Leen Foundation, we are concerned with designing and developing simple and innovative educational tools and materials, with the aim of motivating our children to understand Islam and care about its sciences. We use simple and effective tools such as cardboard, wood, and simple electronic boards, in addition to other resources that facilitate access to information accurately and clearly.

We aim to provide educational content that is easy to understand, suitable for all age groups, while maintaining the simplicity of presentation and the quality of information.

support.question: Do you provide customer support?
support.answer: Yes, we provide dedicated customer support through various channels.

enroll.question: How do I enroll in a course?
enroll.answer: You can easily enroll through our website by selecting a course and following the registration process.

payment.question: What payment methods are accepted?
payment.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit cards and bank transfers.

offline.question: Can I access courses offline?
offline.answer: Yes, many of our courses offer offline access through our mobile app.
